display: Ignition System >> Mechanical (Specifications) >> Ignition System Specifications
title: Ignition System Specifications
content:
SPARK PLUGS

Spark Plugs .................... RC12LYC

Spark Plug gap .................... 0.033 to 0.038 in

IGNITION TIMING

Ignition Timing is controlled by the ICM and is not adjustable. For+ diagnosis of the spark control system see, Computers and Control Systems

FIRING ORDER

1 - 10 - 9 - 4 - 3 - 6 - 5 - 8 - 7 - 2

RESISTANCE VALUES

Ignition cables .................... min. 2400 ohms per ft.
.................... max. 3600 ohms per ft.

Toyodenso Ignition Coil .................... primary 0.51 to 0.61 ohms [1]
.................... secondary 11,500 to 13,500 ohms [1]

Diamond Ignition Coil .................... primary 0.52 to 0.63 ohms [1]
.................... secondary 11,600 to 15,800 ohms [1]

[1] @ 70-80 deg. F
